page.title: 09LEEDS TOWN HALL
page.content: THE TOWN HALL IS THE MAIN BUILDING IN THE MIDDLE OF TOWN .INSIDE IT HAS GOT 14 COURTROOMS,1 OPERA HOUSE AND 1 CAFETERIA ,ONE ROOM TO PAY YOUR FINES 2 ROOMS FOR THE PRESS ,LADIES AND GENTLEMANS TOILETS,IT ALSO HAS GOT STATUES INSIDE. AT THE FRONT OF THE BUILDING IT HAS GOT 4 BIG STATUES OF LIONS WHICH ARE FACING TOWARDS THE HEADROW. UNDERNEATH THE TOWNHALL THERE ARE A FEW CELLS WHERE THE PRISONERS ARE KEPT WHEN THEY ARE WAITING TO BE TAKEN INTO COURT OR TAKEN TO PRISON .INSIDE THE COURTROOM THERE ARE TWO PLAQUES ON THE WALL ABOUT THE SOUTH AFRICAN WAR. WHEN THE COURTS ARE SHUT UPSTAIRS THEY HAVE GOT GATES WHICH STICK OUT FROM THE WALL TO THE BANISTER ON THE STAIRS. WHEN YOU GO THROUGH THE MAIN DOOR THERE IS A BIG PLAQUE ON THE WALL AND THE ROOF IS IN A FANCY PATTERN.
